title: Katy Perry, Orlando Bloom break up to take ‘loving space’
text:
Katy Perry, Orlando Bloom break up to take ‘loving space’ Associated Press / 03:37 AM March 02, 2017 This photo, taken Feb. 26, 2017, shows Katy Perry at the Vanity Fair Oscar Party in Beverly Hills, California. Perry and actor Orlando Bloom are breaking up after about a year together. Representatives for Perry and Bloom released a statement Wednesday saying: “… we can confirm that Orlando and Katy are taking respectful, loving space at this time.” (Photo by EVAN AGOSTINI/Invision/AP) 
Pop star Katy Perry and actor Orlando Bloom are breaking up after about a year together. 
Representatives for Perry and Bloom released a statement Wednesday saying the couple “are taking respectful, loving space at this time.” 
Bloom’s film credits include “Pirates of the Caribbean” and “The Lord of the Rings” trilogy. He was previously married to supermodel Miranda Kerr. ADVERTISEMENT 
Perry is currently promoting her new single “Chained to the Rhythm” and has had hits with “I Kissed a Girl” and “California Gurls.”
